channel.title: Problem with starting up the server
channel.description:
so i have followed a few tutorials and downloaded necessary programs, but i just can't get and source to run. sometimes when i "open" the runserver.bat file inside the source file, it flashes open then closes so quickly i can barley see it. also sometimes it says i don't have the right jdk version even though i have downloaded multiple ones. so i don't have much of an idea why this isn't working.
post if you know what i am doing wrong or think i have done wrong =p[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 07:47:21 AM[/size][hr]in one tutorial i have to "make a new rule" in my router settings and change a variable name and value in my computer properties.

item.title: Problem with starting up the server
item.dc:creator: @kevbot kevbot
item.description:
@kevbot wrote:

umm i know i have this one and lemme check history for other -->http://www.teenhut.net/internet-tech-games/2408-how-create-server-moparscape.html<–[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 07:55:40 AM[/size][hr]ok found the other one, this one i didn’t really use all that much. -->http://forum.ragezone.com/f368/tut-creating-your-own-server-coding-265036/<–[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 07:57:59 AM[/size][hr]so do you see a problem?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 08:06:30 AM[/size][hr]anybody wanna help me?![br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 08:11:30 AM[/size][hr]sometimes when i open the clients and compilers they say things like- the system cannont find path specified - ‘JAVA’ is not recognized as an internet or external cammed, operable program or batch file[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 08:21:56 AM[/size][hr]and just now a source i downloaded (Ricscape) is running but i can’t log into it i have set the port to 43594(defalt) and put in my ip that i set at no-ip.com but it gives me the server is down message[br][size=1]Posted on: July 15, 2007, 08:23:48 AM[/size][hr]can someone at least gimme a suggestion?

Read full topic
